CustomField.description: Select a background color to use for the odd questions e.g. 1, 3, 5â€¦
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose a background color to be used for the odd-numbered questions (e.g., 1, 3, 5...) in the survey response interface. This allows you to differentiate the odd questions from the even questions visually, providing a clear and organized presentation of the survey content.
CustomField.label: Odd Question Background
